item.title: Strong job market in Hong Kong for 2015
item.description:
A new report by recruitment firm REED indicates that 78% of employees in Hong Kong received a pay raise in the last year. The report, titled REED 2015 Salary Survey and Market Insight, covers 14 countries across Asia, Australia, Europe, and the Middle East. REED predicts that Hong Kong’s thriving job market will continue to grow in 2015, driven by substantial foreign investments. The financial, digital marketing, e-commerce, and sales & marketing industries are expected to be particularly strong...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/strong-job-market-in-hong-kong-for-2015/
